mapper.sql: id, wchat_id, user_id, matter, identity_card, vname, state, add_time, last_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from c_visitor
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') uuid from dual
insert into c_visitor
id,
wchat_id,
user_id,
matter,
identity_card,
vname,
state,
add_time,
last_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update c_visitor
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wchat_id = #{record.wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
matter = #{record.matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card = #{record.identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vname = #{record.vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_time = #{record.lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update c_visitor set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wchat_id = #{record.wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, matter = #{record.matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_card = #{record.identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vname = #{record.vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_time = #{record.lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update c_visitor
wchat_id = #{wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
matter = #{matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vname = #{vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_visitor set wchat_id = #{wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, matter = #{matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_card = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vname = #{vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id,GROUP_CONCAT(b.user_name) sysName,a.matter as meetingName, date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') add_time,case when a.state='E' then '未审核' when a.state='P' then '审核通过' when a.state='N' then '审核未通过' end state from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id where a.user_id=#{userid} GROUP BY a.id order by a.add_time desc

select #{sj} sj,aa.sqrs,aa.sqtgrs,bb.sqcs,bb.sqtgcs from (select '1' id,count(*) sqrs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgrs from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') ) aa LEFT JOIN (select '1' id,count(*) sqcs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgcs from c_visitor a where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') ) bb on aa.id=bb.id

select aa.sj,aa.sqrs,aa.sqtgrs,bb.sqcs,bb.sqtgcs from (select date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m') sj,count(*) sqrs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgrs from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') GROUP BY date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m')) aa LEFT JOIN (select date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m') sj,count(*) sqcs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgcs from c_visitor a where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') GROUP BY date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m')) bb on aa.sj=bb.sj

select aa.sj,aa.sqrs,aa.sqtgrs,bb.sqcs,bb.sqtgcs from (select date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') sj,count(*) sqrs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgrs from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') GROUP BY date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) aa LEFT JOIN (select date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') sj,count(*) sqcs,count(case when a.state='P' then 1 end ) sqtgcs from c_visitor a where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%') GROUP BY date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) bb on aa.sj=bb.sj

select a.id,GROUP_CONCAT(b.user_name) sysName,a.matter as meetingName, date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') add_time,case when a.state='E' then '未审核' when a.state='P' then '审核通过' when a.state='N' then '审核未通过' end state from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id
where a.add_time like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.add_time desc

select a.id,b.user_name,a.matter, date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') add_time,b.img,b.user_card,date_format(a.last_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') last_time,b.lxdh vname from c_visitor a LEFT JOIN c_visitor_user b on a.id=b.visitor_id where a.id=#{id} ORDER BY b.id
